name: miss evergreen
sizes_available: one size, but can be adapted with more chains, bigger hook etc...
notes:
miss evergreen – free crochet pattern

meet miss evergreen, a cute and quick crochet christmas tree ornament worked in just 3 rounds and about 3 minutes! perfect as a festive decoration, a charming gift tag topper, or a sweet little add-on for your holiday wrapping.

this pattern includes both written instructions and charts.
size is adjustable by changing hook size, yarn weight, or the number of chains.

create a crisp and defined look with blocked cotton or wool, or go for a soft, sparkling effect using acrylic yarn with glitter. it’s a wonderful scrap-buster project!

you can stiffen the tree with sugar starch or fabric stiffener, and decorate it with beads for a personalized touch. try using different colors for each round for a playful, modern style. it also works beautifully as a brooch, an ornament for cards, or a small gift insert.

hope you enjoy!
